subject: NCAA Baseball Championships
Baseball
Baseball (College)
lead_paragraph: Pitchers Nick Burdi and Kyle Funkhouser are two of the principal reasons the Cardinals are given a chance to win the College World Series, despite being in the loser’s bracket.
snippet: Pitchers Nick Burdi and Kyle Funkhouser are two of the principal reasons the Cardinals are given a chance to win the College World Series, despite being in the loser’s bracket.
